titles.title: For the relief of Kumi Iizuka-Barcena.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law.
Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 110-826.

calendar.text: Placed on the Private Calendar, Calendar No. 4.

action.text: Called up from the Private Calendar for consideration.

vote.text: On passage Passed by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

committee.subcommittee: Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 2/6/2008--Introduced. Provides for the relief of Kumi Iizuka-Barcena.
